product.descripcion:
Diseño: Cuentan con una parte superior de piel sintética con un pronunciado estampado de vaca en tonos blanco roto y marrón oscuro/negro. [1.5, 1.8, 1.15]
Detalles Adicionales: El forro y la plantilla son de cuero sintético rosa, lo que coincide con los tréboles y, a menudo, con los cordones adicionales que se venden por separado

results_by_angle.angle_name: Tendencia ‘cowboycore’ y edición con estampado vaca + forro rosa (look viral)
results_by_angle.buyer_persona: Mujer 18–30 fashion/IG-TikTok; amantes de tendencias y animal print

ad_copy.title: El Look Western del Año
ad_copy.primary_text: Lleva el cowboycore a tus pies con los Samba Og Vaca Negro Blanco. Combina con todo y destaca con su forro rosa. ¿Estás lista para ser tendencia?
ad_copy.description: Consigue el look western viral con Samba y su distintivo estampado de vaca. ¡Haz match con denim o cualquier tendencia!

single_image_prompt.task: Generate a thumb-stopping image of the Samba Og Vaca Negro Blanco sneakers highlighting their unique cow print and pink lining.

input_assets.product_lock_rule: No cropping or obstruction of the sneakers, must be the focal point.

single_image_prompt.prompt: Capture an urban chic scene where a young woman is confidently striding in a vibrant city backdrop. The Samba Og Vaca Negro Blanco sneakers are the clear focus, showcased on her feet. The sneakers stand out with their cow pattern and unique pink lining. The environment should be buzzing with energy, with blurred city lights and a faint graffiti art background. The lighting is bright and professional, casting subtle shadows that emphasize textures and details of the shoes.

composition_rules.focus: sneakers in sharp focus against a dynamic, blurred urban backdrop
composition_rules.hierarchy: sneakers as primary focus, followed by lighting effects and then text overlays

single_image_prompt.negative_prompt: Avoid any rural or farm-like backdrops; do not include any elements that aren't modern or fashion-forward.

hooks_used: Samba Vaca: el look western que está arrasando
Forro rosa + print vaca = outfit viral al instante
compliance_notes: Avoid using exaggerated claims about trend-setting without supportive data.
Ensure any text overlays do not obscure the shoes unnecessarily.

results_by_angle.angle_name: Precio-valor accesible vs. retail oficial de Sambas en Colombia
results_by_angle.buyer_persona: Jóvenes 16–34 que quieren el look Samba sin pagar >600k

ad_copy.title: Estilo sin romper el bolsillo
ad_copy.primary_text: ¡Descubre el look del momento sin pagar más de 600k! Conquista las calles con las Samba Og Vaca Negro Blanco a solo $140.000. Calidad y estilo al mejor precio.
ad_copy.description: Consigue el estilo del año al mejor precio: ¡Samba Og Vaca ya es tuyo por $140.000! Disfruta de calidad y diseño sin gastar de más, ¡oferta por tiempo limitado!

single_image_prompt.task: Generate a single, eye-catching image ad focusing on affordability and style of Samba sneakers.
single_image_prompt.prompt: A pair of Samba Og Vaca Negro Blanco sneakers are prominently displayed against a vibrant backdrop of youthful street culture. The shoes are set on a slightly reflective surface to emphasize their design, with a dramatic, soft spotlight highlighting the intricate cow print and synthetic pink leather lining. The atmosphere should feel energetic and urban, with ambient city life elements subtly blurred to draw focus to the product. Use high contrast lighting to create a visually appealing effect, ensuring the sneakers are perfectly centered in the frame.

composition_rules.text_never_cover_rule: Ensure the sneakers remain unobstructed by text.

single_image_prompt.negative_prompt: Do not include distracting urban elements or irrelevant branding.

hooks_used: El look del año, sin pagar 600k
Más estilo, menos gasto: llévalas hoy
compliance_notes: Ensure all claims made in the ad are verifiable and accurate.
Avoid using restricted language pertaining to quality claims.

results_by_angle.angle_name: Versatilidad para outfits: contraste blanco/negro + acentos rosa
results_by_angle.buyer_persona: Mujeres que combinan básicos (denim, faldas, vestidos) con un toque statement

ad_copy.title: Versatilidad en cada paso
ad_copy.primary_text: Transforma tus básicos con un toque audaz. Las Samba Og Vaca Negro Blanco son el must-have que eleva cualquier look sin esfuerzo. ¡Atrévete a destacar con estilo! #MixComoUnaPro
ad_copy.description: Rompe la monotonía y eleva tu estilo con las Samba Og. Diseño único que combina con todo.

input_assets.product_lock_rule: Must show product clearly with key design features visible.

single_image_prompt.prompt: A stylish and impactful streetwear scene showcasing the Samba Og Vaca Negro Blanco shoes. The shoes are highlighted prominently on a wooden bench in a park, spotlit by natural golden hour light. The bench is surrounded by diverse, urban greenery. The shoes' synthetic upper with bold cow print in black and white stands out. The pink synthetic leather lining is subtly visible, adding a pop of color. Show background activity with people walking and cycling, blurred to keep focus on the shoes. High contrast and vibrant colors to highlight the shoes' unique design and versatile style.

composition_rules.focus: Direct focus on the shoes with secondary elements providing contextual background.
composition_rules.text_safe_zone: Respect 5% margin on edges for text placement.
composition_rules.text_never_cover_rule: Do not cover the shoes especially their cow print design.

single_image_prompt.negative_prompt: Avoid showing any other brands or logos. Exclude people directly modeling the shoes to maintain focus on the product.

hooks_used: Blanco/negro que combina con todo (y un toque rosa)
Tu básico con personalidad: print vaca
Del minimal al bold en un paso
compliance_notes: Ensure no comparatives with other brands are explicitly stated.
Avoid exaggerated claims about versatility without direct demonstrations in the image.
